Advanced HTML Article

This article demonstrates OpenGraph metadata extraction with proper priority fallback.

Introduction

OpenGraph tags should take priority over Dublin Core and standard meta tags.

Features

This document includes:

  1. OpenGraph metadata
  2. Dublin Core metadata (fallback)
  3. Multiple article tags
  4. Publication date

Code Example

def hello():
    print("Hello, world!")

Conclusion

Metadata extraction should prioritize OpenGraph over other sources.
